settings.caption: Discover the Root Cause of Your Dog Indoor Peeing

settings.heading: A PhD VET Reveals: Inappropriate Peeing Affects 68% of Dogs!
settings.text: Of these, 25-45% urinate inappropriately due to underlying stress or anxiety, while up to 52% do so in response to unfamiliar sights, noises or people. Shockingly, most dogs aren’t treated for it, and the longer this issue goes untreated, the worse it gets! But this is all set to change with TheraPet™ — on a mission to offer a stress-free environment for dogs worldwide!

settings.heading: Ever noticed your dog peeing indoors or marking urine? Or often overly alert, suddenly barking at small things, or acting jumpy?

settings.text:
If your pooch is healthy and you're walking them enough, you might wonder, "Why's my dog still peeing at home?" You're not alone. We adore our dogs, but indoor peeing is a challenge.

Dogs have their stress-coping behaviors: indoor peeing, urine marking...

Seeing our dogs like this is hard, especially after trying everything—extra playtime, new toys, costly vet visits, and expensive medications.

Various factors can trigger your dog's “indoor peeing mode”—new environments, loud noises, long hours alone, or even slight changes in routine.

Here, TheraPet™ comes into play, designed to ease this stress and create a tranquil environment for your furry friend.

settings.heading: Does your dog pee indoors, regularly or accidentally, or leave urine marks?
settings.row_content: Some dogs leave urine marks to mark their territory; others choose one spot and consistently pee there. they may also pee out of fear, excitement or loneliness. In all cases, it’s their call for help!

settings.heading: Does your dog often bark or lunge at others randomly?
settings.row_content: This unexpected aggression is a sign of reactivity, often rooted in anxiety or prior stressful experiences.

settings.heading: Does your dog get scared easily with loud noises or new people?
settings.row_content: Being always tense or jumpy, especially in new settings, points to underlying stress or anxiety making them uneasy.

settings.heading: Does your dog act out when you're not around?
settings.row_content: Acting up when left alone can be a sign your dog is feeling stressed when you're not around, known as separation anxiety.

settings.heading: Pacing back and forth or being unable to settle in one place?
settings.row_content: Constant pacing or restlessness often indicates stress, with the dog struggling to find comfort or feeling on high alert.

settings.heading: Frequently restless or struggling to find a calm moment?
settings.row_content: A perpetual state of unrest highlights chronic stress or anxiety, as they're unable to relax and feel at peace.

settings.caption: If the answer is yes to any of these questions …TheraPet Is a Must Have!
settings.heading: It's time to show your dog you care, With TheraPet™ Diffuser
settings.bottom: Look No More! Let TheraPet create a more comfortable, calming home for you and your dog!

settings.text: 78% Reduction in Indoor Peeing
74% Reduction in Destructive Behaviors

TheraPet™ Diffuser effortlessly solves dogs’ indoor peeing issues by easing their stress and anxiety. It releases calming pheromones, perceptible only to dogs, conveying safety and love.

These pheromones target the brain's stress-response cells, reducing the emotional tension that causes indoor peeing and marking.

TheraPet™ transforms your home into a peaceful, dog-pee-free environment, ensuring comfort for your dog and family.

It’s more than a diffuser; it's a daily gesture of care for your dog, ensuring peace and a stronger bond. TheraPet is the key to a welcoming, fresh-smelling home

settings.BlockrichText: Think of them as doggy "feel-good" vibes. When pups are relaxed and happy, they give off these vibes to let their buddies know, "Hey, everything's chill here." So, when your fur baby gets a whiff of TheraPet's pheromones, they feel like they're in their happy place, and don't feel the urge to release the tension by urinating.

settings.heading: What exactly is TheraPet™ Diffuser?
settings.row_content: TheraPet™ is an innovative diffuser designed to reduce dog reactivity, stress, and anxiety by releasing calming pheromones that only dogs can detect. It provides your pup with a comforting message that they're safe and loved.

settings.heading: What are dog pheromones?
settings.row_content: Dog pheromones are natural chemicals produced by dogs to communicate with each other. These pheromones convey various messages, such as comfort, security, and contentment. TheraPet™ utilizes Canine Appeasing Pheromones and Maternal Appeasing Pheromones, replicating these calming signals to help reduce stress, anxiety, and reactivity in dogs.

settings.heading: How does TheraPet™ combat stress and reactivity in dogs?
settings.row_content: TheraPet™ releases Canine Appeasing Pheromones and Maternal Appeasing Pheromones, which are natural "feel-good" vibes. They help create a serene environment, reducing reactive behaviors and instilling a sense of calm and security.

settings.heading: Will TheraPet™ interfere with my dog's medications or diet?
settings.row_content: No, TheraPet™ is a non-invasive, drug-free solution that doesn't require any dietary changes or interfere with any medications your dog may be on.

settings.heading: How long does it take to see results with TheraPet™?
settings.row_content: Many users notice a difference in their dog's behavior within a week, but results can vary based on the dog and the level of stress or anxiety they experience.

settings.heading: Can TheraPet™ help if my dog is afraid of specific noises or situations?
settings.row_content: Definitely. TheraPet™ helps with a range of anxieties, including fear of noises, making it easier for dogs to adapt to unfamiliar situations.

settings.heading: Where should I use the diffuser?
settings.row_content: The plug-in should be used in rooms where your dog spends most of its time. Avoid using outlets that are under windows, near air vents, or close to doors as drafts will impair the proper diffusion of the pheromones. DO NOT plug the diffuser into a power strip or surge protector. The vial should always be directly below the plug-in unit for proper diffusion and to prevent leakage. To ensure the vial is always below the plug-in unit, there is a swivel function on the prongs for outlets with horizontal orientations.

settings.heading: Is TheraPet™ safe for homes with multiple dogs?
settings.row_content: Absolutely! TheraPet™ is ideal for multi-dog households, ensuring a harmonious environment for all your furry friends.

settings.heading: Is the smell normal?
settings.row_content: The pheromones are diffused when the plug-in unit heats up. As with any heating element, a slight smell may be present and is totally normal. If you find your diffuser has a stronger smell, please call us and we will be happy to troubleshoot with you!

settings.heading: Should I unplug the diffuser at night?
settings.row_content: To keep the good vibes flowing, you should keep your diffuser plugged in at all times. If you notice your diffuser collecting dust, please unplug and follow the cleaning instructions in the user manual found in every box.

settings.heading: How often should I replace the diffuser?
settings.row_content: We recommend replacing the refill vial every 30 days or when the liquid runs out. The plug-in unit should be replaced after 6 months of use or after you have used three refill vials (whichever comes first!)

settings.heading: What makes TheraPet™ different from other diffusers on the market?
settings.row_content: TheraPet™ is the only diffuser with our unique pheromone combination, designed specifically to address dog stress, anxiety, and reactivity, making it a game-changer for dog parents.

settings.heading: In what currency are the prices listed on the store ?
settings.row_content: All prices listed on our store are in United States Dollars (USD)

settings.heading: Is TheraPet available on retail shops or marketplaces like Amazon and eBay?
settings.row_content:
No, TheraPet is exclusively sold on our official store with a 30-day money-back guarantee and warranty.

Beware of unauthorized, low-quality copycats on Amazon, eBay, and other platforms. For authentic, top-quality Pheromones, buy only from our official store.

settings.heading: What if I'm not satisfied with the results?
settings.row_content: We stand by the efficacy of TheraPet™. If you're not seeing positive changes in your dog's behavior, please reach out to our customer service team for support and assistance.
